articles.title: ITV's Dr Hilary fumes over 'misinformed' GMB viewers' vaccine fears: 'Can't believe it!' - Express
articles.description: ITV medical expert Dr Hilary Jones was baffled by the response to a Good Morning Britain poll which suggested almost half of viewers would be sceptical about taking the coronavirus vaccine.
